title: Fundamental Formulas for Plant Physiology
text: goal plantphysioR provide basic functions related plant physiology, contains functions related various yield related indices, pigment content calculations PEG6000 calculations

title: Fundamental Formulas for Plant Physiology
text: can install development version plantphysioR GitHub :

title: Fundamental Formulas for Plant Physiology
code: library(plantphysioR) #all_indices  Ms<-mean(yield_data$Ys) Ms<-mean(yield_data$Ys) Yp<-yield_data$Yp Ys<-yield_data$Ys all_indices(Yp,Ys,Mp,Ms) #This function calculates all the yield related indices inclued in the package # calculation of Stress susceptibility index ss_index(500, 350, 450, 370)

what: plantphysioR: Fundamental Formulas for Plant Physiology — plantphysioR-package
title: plantphysioR: Fundamental Formulas for Plant Physiology — plantphysioR-package
text: Functions tailored scientific student communities involved plant science research. Functionalities encompass estimation chlorophyll content according Arnon (1949) doi:10.1104/pp.24.1.1 , determination water potential Polyethylene glycol(PEG)6000 Michel Kaufmann (1973) doi:10.1104/pp.51.5.914  functions related estimation yield related indices like Abiotic tolerance index given Moosavi et al.(2008)doi:10.22059/JDESERT.2008.27115 , Geometric mean productivity (GMP) Fernandez (1992) <ISBN:92-9058-081-X>, Golden Mean Moradi et al.(2012)doi:10.14207/ejsd.2012.v1n3p543 , HAM Schneider et al.(1997)doi:10.2135/cropsci1997.0011183X003700010007x ,MPI TOL Hossain etal., (1990)doi:10.2135/cropsci1990.0011183X003000030030x , RDI Fischer et al. (1979)doi:10.1071/AR9791001 ,SSI Fisher et al.(1978)doi:10.1071/AR9780897 , STI Fernandez (1993)doi:10.22001/wvc.72511 ,YSI Bouslama & Schapaugh (1984)doi:10.2135/cropsci1984.0011183X002400050026x , Yield index Gavuzzi et al.(1997)doi:10.4141/P96-130 .
